import React from "react"; import API from "../../utils/API"; function Results(props) { return ( {props.results && props.results.map((result, index) => result.name.first.toLowerCase().includes(props.search) ? ( ) : result.name.last.toLowerCase().includes(props.search) ? ( ) : null )}
Picture Name Phone Email DOB
{result.name.first} {result.name.last} {result.phone} {result.email} {result.dob.date}

); } export default Results;
